attributes.title: Can They Survive This High School?
attributes.caption: Can the 3 "smartest" minds at this prestigious school get out alive?? Probably not.
attributes.description: Can the 3 "smartest" minds at this prestigious school get out alive?? Probably not.
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive This High School?

attributes.title: Can They Escape Virtual Reality?
attributes.caption: Reality may be virtual, but the poor decisions are just as real.
attributes.description: Reality may be virtual, but the poor decisions are just as real.
attributes.display_title: Can They Escape Virtual Reality?

attributes.title: Can They Escape A Crisis Bunker?
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew gets stuck in a crisis bunker.  How will they escape?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew gets stuck in a crisis bunker.  How will they escape?
attributes.display_title: Can They Escape A Crisis Bunker?

attributes.title: Can They Guess The Traitor?
attributes.caption: High school's hard enough as it is, but can the three brightest students find the traitor among their group?
attributes.description: High school's hard enough as it is, but can the three brightest students find the traitor among their group?
attributes.display_title: Can They Guess The Traitor?

attributes.title: Can They Escape Willy Wonka's Chocolate Factory?
attributes.caption: We welcome a NEW member to Recreyo! Plus we see if a golden ticket to Willy Wonka's Chocolate factory wasn't a way in, but a way to escape...
attributes.description: We welcome a NEW member to Recreyo! Plus we see if a golden ticket to Willy Wonka's Chocolate factory wasn't a way in, but a way to escape...
attributes.display_title: Can They Escape Willy Wonka's Chocolate Factory?

attributes.title: Can They Escape Jurassic Park?
attributes.caption: We had the bright idea to go to Raptor Park to make some dino friends.
attributes.description: We had the bright idea to go to Raptor Park to make some dino friends.
attributes.display_title: Can They Escape Jurassic Park?

attributes.title: Can They Become Wizards? (Ft. Yssa Badiola)
attributes.caption: Are we worthy enough to become wizards? Well, we bring a guest to find out!
attributes.description: Are we worthy enough to become wizards? Well, we bring a guest to find out!
attributes.display_title: Can They Become Wizards? (Ft. Yssa Badiola)

attributes.title: Can They Find The Killer?
attributes.caption: Can we figure out which one of us is guilty before another victim is chose?
attributes.description: Can we figure out which one of us is guilty before another victim is chose?
attributes.display_title: Can They Find The Killer?

attributes.title: What's Your Personality Type?
attributes.caption: So who in the group is normal, and who is crazy? A little therapy will help us decide as we determine everyone's personality type.
attributes.description: So who in the group is normal, and who is crazy? A little therapy will help us decide as we determine everyone's personality type.
attributes.display_title: What's Your Personality Type?

attributes.title: Can They Pull Off a Casino Heist?
attributes.caption: Its time for Recreyo to pull of the greatest heist of the decade, and rob a casino (we're really poor, okay?) Can we get past security and get to the vault in time?
attributes.description: Its time for Recreyo to pull of the greatest heist of the decade, and rob a casino (we're really poor, okay?) Can we get past security and get to the vault in time?
attributes.display_title: Can They Pull Off a Casino Heist?

attributes.title: Can They Escape a Parallel Dimension?
attributes.caption: After trying a mysterious charm the Recreyo crew finds themselves in another dimension. And the only way they'll be able to escape, is if they trust one another... ya lets see how that goes.
attributes.description: After trying a mysterious charm the Recreyo crew finds themselves in another dimension. And the only way they'll be able to escape, is if they trust one another... ya lets see how that goes.
attributes.display_title: Can They Escape a Parallel Dimension?

attributes.title: Can They Escape Hell? (Ft. Good Morning From Hell)
attributes.caption: Hell is the one place you don't want to get stuck in... but here we are.
attributes.description: Hell is the one place you don't want to get stuck in... but here we are.
attributes.display_title: Can They Escape Hell? (Ft. Good Morning From Hell)

attributes.title: Can They Survive Among Us?
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew and the Beyond The Bot team are on a ship, trying to find the imposter among us. Will they succeed?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew and the Beyond The Bot team are on a ship, trying to find the imposter among us. Will they succeed?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive Among Us?

attributes.title: Can They Survive a Demonic Possession?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew has a demon in their midst, and its all Chilly's fault.. Will we be able to find out the demon in the group?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive a Demonic Possession?

attributes.title: Can They Beat the Alien Impostor?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew are trapped in space, and their cargo has broken loose. Can they get the power going before they get caught?
attributes.display_title: Can They Beat the Alien Impostor?

attributes.title: Can They Survive A Zombie Apocalypse?
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew are stuck in a zombie apocalypse. Will their decisions keep them alive?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew are stuck in a zombie apocalypse. Will their decisions keep them alive?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive A Zombie Apocalypse?

attributes.title: What Your Personality Type Says About You
attributes.caption: So who in the group is normal, and who is crazy? A little therapy will help us decide as we determine everyone's personality type.
attributes.description: So who in the group is normal, and who is crazy? A little therapy will help us decide as we determine everyone's personality type.
attributes.display_title: What Your Personality Type Says About You

attributes.title: Can They Survive Mortal Kombat?
attributes.caption: Is the Recreyo Crew worthy of representing Earth?? Probably not.
attributes.description: Is the Recreyo Crew worthy of representing Earth?? Probably not.
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive Mortal Kombat?

attributes.title: Can They Survive The Mummy?
attributes.caption: This time around the Recreyo crew explore a tomb to see if they can find the mummy's treasure. Will they find that, or trust issues?
attributes.description: This time around the Recreyo crew explore a tomb to see if they can find the mummy's treasure. Will they find that, or trust issues?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive The Mummy?

attributes.title: Piloting a Giant Gundam
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew has a job to do. Save the planet with a giant Gundam suit. But will they even be able to get it out of the hanger?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew has a job to do. Save the planet with a giant Gundam suit. But will they even be able to get it out of the hanger?
attributes.display_title: Piloting a Giant Gundam

attributes.title: Can They Survive Re: ZERO?
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew just got Isekai'd! Can they make better decisions than Subaru did?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew just got Isekai'd! Can they make better decisions than Subaru did?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive Re: ZERO?

attributes.title: Can They Escape Wonderland?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew get transported to the world of Alice in Wonderland, and with the help of a very human looking bunny, go on a journey that takes them deeper and deeper down the rabbit hole.
attributes.display_title: Can They Escape Wonderland?

attributes.title: Can They Survive Rick and Morty?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew explore Morp Morp Corp, this time with the help of a certain drunk scientist. Will they be able to escape without getting... pregnant?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive Rick and Morty?

attributes.title: Can They Steal The Krabby Patty Secret Formula?
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew is trying to steal the Krabby Patty Formula, but their is a traitor in the group reporting them to the feds... Will they guess who the traitor is?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew is trying to steal the Krabby Patty Formula, but their is a traitor in the group reporting them to the feds... Will they guess who the traitor is?
attributes.display_title: Can They Steal The Krabby Patty Secret Formula?

attributes.title: What Bender Are You?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew are going to become benders, but what bender does each of their personality types put them under?
attributes.display_title: What Bender Are You?

attributes.title: Can They Survive Home Alone?
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew are stuck at home, and some people are about to break in... can they beat the thieves before they take everything?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew are stuck at home, and some people are about to break in... can they beat the thieves before they take everything?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive Home Alone?

attributes.title: Can They Survive Death Note?
attributes.description: This time the Recreyo crew are given the power of a shinigami. Will they use their abilities for good or for evil?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive Death Note?

attributes.title: Can They Survive The Promised Neverland?
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew are orphans, and upon one of them finally getting adopted, they learn of a dark secret... will they be able to escape the orphanage?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew are orphans, and upon one of them finally getting adopted, they learn of a dark secret... will they be able to escape the orphanage?
attributes.display_title: Can They Survive The Promised Neverland?

attributes.title: Can You Survive M.I.L.F.? | Friday Night Funkin'
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew once again try to get a girlfriend.
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew once again try to get a girlfriend.
attributes.display_title: Can You Survive M.I.L.F.? | Friday Night Funkin'

attributes.title: Can You Survive Dr. Stone? (Ft.  @YourBudTevin )
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew drop in the world of Dr. Stone!
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew drop in the world of Dr. Stone!
attributes.display_title: Can You Survive Dr. Stone? (Ft.  @YourBudTevin )

attributes.title: Can You Survive the Scariest Anime? | Another
attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew are time traveling back to middle school to solve a mysterious case.   Can they survive the scariest anime ever created?
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew are time traveling back to middle school to solve a mysterious case.   Can they survive the scariest anime ever created?
attributes.display_title: Can You Survive the Scariest Anime? | Another

attributes.caption: The Recreyo crew try to solve the Impossible Quiz
attributes.description: The Recreyo crew try to solve the Impossible Quiz
